title: Cognitive Task Analysis-Based Social Studies Instructional Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Core Social Studies Concepts and Experience with Online Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Short intensive courses for working professionals participating outside work hours, with a primary focus on acquiring Cognitive Task Analysis (CTA) methodology for social studies curriculum design

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze students' cognitive processes on social studies topics (e.g., community structure) using the CTA technique
Learners can create detailed lesson activity design documents based on CTA results
Learners can explain the effectiveness of designed lesson activities through peer evaluation using three or more cognitive elements (e.g., information processing, problem-solving)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
